column1: tvam SRNu iyam hi DarmatA
column2: byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig /'di ni chos nyid yin te /

column1: yadA boDisattvena boDisattva saMvara samAdAna karma vAcanA parisampAdyate tadA daSa diS sarva budDa kzetrezu budDa boDisattvezu etAdRS niprAdurBavanti
column2: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par len pa'i las brjod pa rdzogs pa de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di lta bu'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te /

column1: te budDa boDisattvAH evam kasmiMScid budDa kzetre evaMnAmA boDisattvaH evaMnAmnaH boDisattvAt boDisattva saMvara samAdAnam gRhNAti iti
column2: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga ge mo zhig na / byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya bas byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa mnos so zhes yang dag par mkhyen par na / 'gyur ro //

column1: atas te BagavantaH budDA te ca boDisattvAH Darma snehAt putrAn BrAtRkAn iva sandaDate taTA sanDAnAt puNya jQAna samBAra vRdDiH Bavizyati iti vaktavyam
column2: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis chos kyi brtse bas bu dang spun zla'i dgongs pa mdzad la de ltar dgongs pa mdzad pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //

column1: aTa tena kalyANa mitreNa sa boDisattvaH evam vaktvyaH
column2: de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //

column1: evaMnAma boDisattva tvam SRNu
column2: byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa 'di dad pa med pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste / gang gi phyir /

column1: boDisattva saMvara samAdAnam idam aSraddaDAnAnAm agre na vAcyam
column2: dad pa med pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa rab tu bstan na /

column1: yatas SradDeByaH boDisattva saMvara pradarSane aSraddaDAnAH sattvAH te boDisattva saMvaram aSradDayA parityajanti
column2: dad pa med pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ma dad pas spong bar byed de /

column1: atas yAvat boDisattvaH boDisattva saMvara sTitaH puNya rASi yuktaH Bavati tAvat aSradDayA sa tena eva apuNya rASinA ca yuktaH Bavati
column2: des na ji snyed byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la gnas pa la bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ba de snyed kyi bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ma dad pa de dang ldan par 'gyur ro //

column1: yatas boDisattvaH sattvAn sarva duHKeByaH parirakzati anyAn= ca pApeByaH nivArayati atas sa kuSalaH boDisattvaH gopAyati
column2: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpas sems can sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su bsrung bar bya ba yin pas gzhan sdig pa las bzlog par bya ste / de'i phyir mchog tu dge ba'i byang chub sems dpas gsang bar bya ba yin no //

column1: aTa SikzA pada pArAjika sTAna BUtAn saMvara nASa hetUn darSayitvA duzkRtAn klizwa aklizwAn api darSayet
column2: de nas bslab pa'i gzhi pham pa'i gnas su gyur pa sdom pa 'jig pa'i rgyu bstan cing / nyes byas kyi ltung ba nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma @248b yin pa yang bstan par bya'o //

column1: kalyANa mitraH samAsatas boDisattva saMvara viMSakam taTA boDisattva BUmeH SIla parivart taQca BAzeta
column2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdor bsdus pa byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa nyi shu pa par bya'o // dang /

column1: boDi citta utpAda boDisattva saMvara viDiH mahAcArya dIpaFkara SrI jQAna kRtaH samAptaH
column2: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bshad par bya'o // byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i cho ga / slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /

column1: tena eva BAratIya upADyAyena mahA saMSoDaka loka cakzuzA Bikzu kuSala matinA dge vE blaH groH ca anUditaH
column2: /// rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur ba lags so //

column1: punar tena eva paNxitena loka cakzuzA Bikzu jaya SIlena Cul KrimH rgyat va
